verses.text: For this \w cause|strong="G5484"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, the \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*,

\w If|strong="G1489"\w* ye have heard \w of|strong="G0191"\w* the \w dispensation|strong="G3622"\w* of the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you-ward|strong="G5209"\w*:

How \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* he made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w*; (\w as|strong="G2531"\w* I wrote \w afore|strong="G4270"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* few \w words|strong="G3641"\w*,

\w Whereby|strong="G3739"\w*, \w when|strong="G4314"\w* ye \w read|strong="G0314"\w*, ye \w may|strong="G1410"\w* \w understand|strong="G3539"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G4907"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*)

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w ages|strong="G1074"\w* \w was|strong="G1107"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* it \w is|strong="G0601"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w unto|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*;

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w fellowheirs|strong="G4789"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the same \w body|strong="G4954"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w partakers|strong="G4830"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*:

\w Whereof|strong="G3739"\w* I was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* a \w minister|strong="G1249"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* of the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the effectual \w working|strong="G1753"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*.

Unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, who \w am|strong="G3588"\w* less than the \w least|strong="G1647"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w is|strong="G1325"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w*, that I should \w preach|strong="G2097"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* the \w unsearchable|strong="G0421"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w make|strong="G5461"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* \w see|strong="G5461"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* the \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* of the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the beginning of the \w world|strong="G0165"\w* hath been \w hid|strong="G0613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w created|strong="G2936"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

To the intent \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* unto the \w principalities|strong="G0746"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \add places\add* might be \w known|strong="G1107"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* the \w manifold|strong="G4182"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

According \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w eternal|strong="G0165"\w* \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w purposed|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w access|strong="G4318"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I \w desire|strong="G0154"\w* that ye \w faint|strong="G1573"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w tribulations|strong="G2347"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

For this \w cause|strong="G5484"\w* I \w bow|strong="G2578"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w knees|strong="G1119"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w Of|strong="G1537"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w family|strong="G3965"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* is \w named|strong="G3687"\w*,

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* he would \w grant|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, to be \w strengthened|strong="G2901"\w* with \w might|strong="G1411"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w inner|strong="G2080"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*;

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* may \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; that ye, being \w rooted|strong="G4492"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w grounded|strong="G2311"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*,

May be \w able|strong="G1840"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w comprehend|strong="G2638"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* the \w breadth|strong="G4114"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w length|strong="G3372"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w depth|strong="G0899"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w height|strong="G5311"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* to \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w passeth|strong="G5235"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might be \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* unto him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G5228"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* exceeding \w abundantly|strong="G4057"\w* \w above|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* we \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w think|strong="G3539"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*,

Unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w ages|strong="G1074"\w*, \w world|strong="G0165"\w* without \w end|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
